Immigrants and Emigrants (Amendment)
Act, No. 27 of 2021
[Certified on 12th of November, 2021]
AN ACT TO AMEND THE IMMIGRANTS AND EMIGRANTS ACT (CHAPTER 351)
BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :–
This Act may be cited as the Immigrants and Short title Emigrants (Amendment) Act, No. 27 of 2021.
Section 14 of the Immigrants and Emigrants Act (Chapter 351) is hereby amended as follows:–
in subsection (1) thereof, by the substitution for the words, “two years,” of the words “five years,”;
Amendment of section 14 of Chapter 351
in subsection (2) thereof, by the substitution for the words, “exceeding two years but not exceeding five years,” of the words “exceeding five years but not exceeding ten years,”; and
by the insertion immediately after subsection (3) thereof, of the following subsection:-
“(3A) (a) Notwithstanding the time limits specified in subsections (1) and (2), the period of permanent residence visa may be determined by the Minister.
For the purpose of paragraph (a), “permanent residence visa” means, a visa granted under regulations made under this Act.”.
In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala Sinhala text to
and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
